main event: A witness observed a white, brilliant object shaped like a basketball flying in Brunswick, Georgia on June 23, 1954.
interesting points: The object maintained level flight for about 10-15 seconds,The length of observation is unusual for a meteor,There was no physical evidence or photographs associated with the sighting,The conclusion suggested that the object could be a meteor despite the extended observation time,The document appears to be from Project Blue Book, indicating possible government interest in UFO sightings.
witness description: There was at least one witness to the observation.
